016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.registration;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.update.DnsUpdates;
019import jakarta.inject.Inject;
020import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
021import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PreDestroy;
022import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.RunLevel;
023import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
024import org.xbill.DNS.DClass;
025import org.xbill.DNS.Record;
026
027import java.io.IOException;
028import java.util.ArrayList;
029import java.util.List;
030import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
031
032@Service(name = "dns.registration")
033@RunLevel(20)
034public class DnsRegistrationService
035        implements PreDestroy {
036
037    private final DnsUpdates dnsUpdates;
038    private final Logger logger;
039    private final List<Record> records;
040
041    @Inject
042    public DnsRegistrationService(DnsRecords dnsRecords,
043                                  DnsUpdates dnsUpdates,
044                                  Logger logger) throws IOException {
045        this.dnsUpdates = dnsUpdates;
046        this.logger = logger;
047        this.records = dnsRecords.getRecords();
048
049        dnsUpdates.updateDns(records).toCompletableFuture().orTimeout(10, TimeUnit.SECONDS).join();
050        logger.info("Registered services in DNS");
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public void preDestroy() {
055        // Remove DNS records for this server
056        List<Record> deleteRecords = new ArrayList<>();
057        for (Record registeredRecord : records) {
058            deleteRecords.add(Record.newRecord(registeredRecord.getName(), registeredRecord.getType(), DClass.NONE, 0, registeredRecord.rdataToWireCanonical()));
059        }
060
061        try {
062            dnsUpdates.updateDns(deleteRecords).toCompletableFuture().orTimeout(10, TimeUnit.SECONDS).join();
063            logger.info("Deregistered services from DNS");
064        } catch (Exception e) {
065            logger.error("Failed to deregister services from DNS", e);
066        }
067    }
068}
